description: Sunset backwaters and palm-lined shores of Kollam, a soundtrack for boat rides, breeze and longing.

items.name: Our Lady Of Purification Church
items.section_excerpt: Our Lady Of Purification Church, locally popular as Kollam Port Church is one of the oldest churches in Kollam and the entire state. Believed and worshipped as the relic of Saint Thomas, this church is immensely popular among locals and tourists. Along with other festivals and regular Sunday masses, the church is famous across the country for the feast of Our Lady of Purification Church, held in Jâ€¦
items.description: Our Lady Of Purification Church, locally popular as Kollam Port Church is one of the oldest churches in Kollam and the entire state. Believed and worshipped as the relic of Saint Thomas, this church is immensely popular among locals and tourists. Along with other festivals and regular Sunday masses, the church is famous across the country for the feast of Our Lady of Purification Church, held in January and February every year. Devotees across all religions attend this festival which comprises of the feast, special prayers, and grand processions through the town.
